first_para: Patrick "Pat" Doherty (born 18 July 1945) is an Irish politician and abstentionist Member of Parliament for West Tyrone. He was a member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for the same constituency from June 1998 to June 2012. Doherty served as Vice President of Sinn Féin from 1988 to 2009, when Mary Lou McDonald became the party's new Vice-President.

full.extract: Patrick "Pat" Doherty (born 18 July 1945) is an Irish politician and abstentionist Member of Parliament for West Tyrone. He was a member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for the same constituency from June 1998 to June 2012. Doherty served as Vice President of Sinn Féin from 1988 to 2009, when Mary Lou McDonald became the party's new Vice-President.
full.title: Pat Doherty
